description: Mugwort (Artemisia afra) is an amazing plant species that has many beneficial uses. It's an all-purpose herb that grows abundantly in many parts of the world and has long been used in many traditional Chinese and European medicines. Mugwort has been known to have antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, and antiviral properties and can be used to help treat digestive complaints, mild skin infections, muscle cramps, and anxiety. It also has a pleasant smell and has been used as a tea to both aid digestion and as a calming, soothing relaxant. Its wide range of uses makes mugwort an incredible medicinal and culinary resource, and its anti-inflammatory properties can be used to help boost the immune system.
